title: National debt of Japan 2024
yAxis: National debt in billion U.S. dollar
summary: This statistic shows the National debt of Japan from 2014 to 2018 , with projections up until 2024 in billion to the 2024 ( U.S. ) .
The figures refer to the whole country and include the debts of the state , the communities , the municipalities and the social insurances .
In 2018 , the National debt of Japan amounted to approximately 11924.1 billion of the U.S. .
gold: The statistic shows the national debt of Japan from 2014 to 2017 , with projections up until 2024 . The amount of Japan 's national debt in 2017 amounted to about 11.73 trillion U.S. dollar . In a ranking of debt to GDP per country , Japan is thus currently ranked first .
